casebody.data:
Michael RANKINS
v.
Michael D. JOHNSON. No. 372P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005.

Michael Rankins, Pro Se.

William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Michael D. Johnson.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 12th day of July 2005 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Chowan County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
